email_chain.subject: Offer for Wheat Shipment - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

I hope this message finds you well. We have the MV SEA HORIZON available for your wheat shipment from Houston to Shanghai. The vessel has a DWT of 180,000 and an LOA of 250m. The starting freight rate is $45/MT on CIF terms. The laycan is 15-20 October. Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Alex Martin
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Wheat Shipment - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to the current market. Can you consider $40/MT? Also, could you confirm the loading window and demurrage rate?

Best,
Sarah Connor
Global Freight Solutions

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Wheat Shipment - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

Thank you for your response. I can offer a reduced rate of $42/MT. The loading window is 48 hours, and the demurrage rate is $15,000 per day, pro rata. Please let me know if this is acceptable.

Best regards,
Alex Martin
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Wheat Shipment - MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

$42/MT is acceptable. Can we confirm the laycan as 15-20 October? Also, please send over the charter party for review.

Best,
Sarah Connor
Global Freight Solutions

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Charter Party for MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

Great, I will proceed with the booking. Attached is the charter party for your review. Please let me know if any adjustments are needed.

Best regards,
Alex Martin
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Fwd: Charter Party for MV SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

The charter party looks good. We will proceed as discussed. Thank you for your assistance!

Best,
Sarah Connor
Global Freight Solutions
